text: tae anak( mou ham meat) minban doeng te tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh trauv ban anak del now leumekh cheachraen chean ning phendei haeyning satvasleab del haer tradeangoslab teangkou now leu akasa leukatamkeung sarsaer champoh trong noh? real satvalok teangoasa sotthote ban doengpi rbieb korp sakkar ning kar kaotasarsaer leuk tamkeung trong . haey a l laoh mha doeng nouv avei del puokke thveu
